entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm except 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023
